name: My 8.5 Nightmares
description:
Continuing from where we left off in "My 7000 Nightmares", our ship is destroyed and we have no crew or supplies.  Spooky's army continues to grow and we have to stop her, to make it worse all the horrors we captured previously  have now been set free and we have to deal with them again.

We must collect resources and rebuild our ship, weapons and crew.  During our missions we learn about a new weapon called "The Unity Device", the dam thing could be real and Spooky wants it, if she gets it she will be unstoppable.  We have to get there first.  You start by gathering energy to power the gate to travel to missions but your resources are limited, you can only play 5 missions out of the list of destinations so you must choose wisely, collect resources to build your ship...the more resources you collect the better.  If you find a mission is too hard you can choose another mission to play,

you have full freedom to choose your path.  The more difficult the mission is the more resources you can gather.

What will you do?
